short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know your air. This extension displays the latest air pollution levels recorded at over 100 monitoring stations across London.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*New* Nowcast Maps. London's air pollution mapped. Everywhere, every hour.*

Local Authorities.
Scroll though the boroughs of London to find monitoring stations in your area.

Maps.
Hourly updated and annual 20 metre resolution maps of London give you an unparalleled view of air quality wherever you are.

Video Guide.
Ten short videos on commonly asked questions about air pollution and health.

Alerts.
This extension will run in the background and alert you when pollution levels rise to Moderate or above.

**If you like this, check out our new Android App!
https://market.android.com/details?id=uk.org.londonair.laqn


The Environmental Research Group (ERG) at Kingâ€™s College London is London's leading air quality information and research group.
http://www.londonair.org.uk

This application is possible thanks to the continued support and participation of the boroughs of London in the London Air Quality Network.

Designed and developed by Paul McIlreavy with additional graphics and UI by Andrew Grieve.
